title: I keep getting corrupted files
body: Okay, so i join a ranked game i get into loading screen then i get a bug splat and its impossible to reconnect even if the game started i still can't join. So i restart my launcher and then it says "Sorry! We've detected some possible data corruption in your installation. Would you like to repair the affected files?".   So i click fix files then it works again but then it will happen again after a couple of games. I uninstalled then reinstalled league and still same problem, ive even restored my computer and now it does it again. I really need help so if any of u have suggestions or know what to do please tell me thanks. And its really bs cause i lose lp cause of this like i don't even want to play ranked because if this happens ill lose lp. And sometimes when this happens, it doesn't even let my team remake the game?????????

replies.body:
Frequent corruptions can happen if there are nonoptimal configurations made during installation or problems with the drive that League is installed to. As a point of reference, League should be installed to your **C:\ drive** in the default directory suggested during installation **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**, as any other installation locale can cause problems. Additionally, it should be installed as admin (right click installer, run as admin) to ensure it installed all the correct components. 

Finally, any Firewall present on your system should have League whitelisted or added as an exception to the rules so the Firewall doesn't unintentionally delete crucial files in the League directory. I recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and running a clean reinstall of League. Simply run the application, check the boxes for **Reinstall** and **Clean Uninstall**, then let the tasks complete. 

Let me know if this caused any change in your issue and be sure to test any changes in a custom match to avoid penalties.

In that case, I suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you attach a set of logs to your ticket using the HRT you used for the clean reinstall, it will expedite your ticket service.

Let me know if you have any questions.
